comments: This problem only arrived with the M9 build (M8 was fine) so this could be with Eclipse not Hyades, once I finish downloading the latest integration build I'll test against that as well. The problem can be reproduced by following the opening steps of this tutorial up till step 3 where the M9 doesn't have the Build option highlighted(differences between 2.1.3 and 3.0). Now switch to profile and logging perspective, in M8 all run options under both profile and just run are available, however now there there are no run options under the "Profile JCarModel" button but there are run options under "Run JCarModel". So run as application and play around with it and quit. Now observe under "Profile JCarModel" there are still no options under the "Profile As" button but now at the top you see "1 JCarModel" suggesting a profile for a application. Select that option and when it tries to launch get this lovely traceback. java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/xerces/jaxp/SAXParserFactoryImpl at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.SAXFragmentHandler.makeParser(SAXFragmentHandler.java:172) at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.SAXFragmentHandler.setXMLLoader(SAXFragmentHandler.java:47) at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.XMLLoader.makeScanner(XMLLoader.java:452) at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.XMLLoader.(XMLLoader.java:59) at org.eclipse.hyades.trace.ui.internal.piclient.XMLTraceDataProcessor.(XMLTraceDataProcessor.java:82) at org.eclipse.hyades.trace.ui.internal.piclient.PIProcessListener.agentActive(PIProcessListener.java:144) at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.AgentImpl.handleCommand(AgentImpl.java:404) at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.ProcessImpl.handleCommand(ProcessImpl.java:552) at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.ProcessImpl$1.incommingCommand(ProcessImpl.java:130) at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.ConnectionImpl$1.incommingCommand(ConnectionImpl.java:177) at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.ConnectionImpl.processControlMessage(ConnectionImpl.java:393) at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.ConnectionImpl$SocketReaderThread.run(ConnectionImpl.java:484)

Eugene,  I am punting this to you as you are the last entry on the satck (the 
loaders).  this is an issue with the fact Xerces was removed from M9.  The 
loaders should no longer be using xerces and I suspect they are not.  Please 
work with Aaron to ensure his configuration is correct.

Curtis, can you please work with Aaron on this problem. It seems like 
something's wrong with the JVM being used. Marius should be able to provide you 
with more information about the loader.

Do you remember which build you were using? I suspect this problem will 
disappear in later builds.

Marius, can you confirm that the loaders are no longer using Xerces? I did a 
text search and found no instances of org.apache.xerces in our components.

Yeah, I was using the M9, I finally got the I20040526 downloaded and installed
and the bug appears to be fixed.
